sentences.sentence: So sad to look at his face, miss Douce condoled.
sentences.translation: “我一看他的脸就觉得难过，”杜丝小姐用同情的口吻说。

sentences.sentence: 62miss Douce said yes, sitting with his ex, pearl grey and eau DE Nil.
sentences.translation: 62杜丝小姐说是啊，和大人并肩坐着，发灰的珍珠色和一片淡绿蓝色。

sentences.sentence: Douce mien to pursue progression and to advance the artistic standards.
sentences.translation: 简言之，要以严肃的态度去对待这种轻松的艺术，追求进步，提升技艺。
